page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED.
page.content: sponsored for Â£10.00 if I swam 25 widths, I hoped I could do them. Mum had to count the widths, I hoped she could keep up with us all. When we got to the swimming pool without dinner, did'nt have time , I got undressed in the changing room .I dived into the pool in the deep end.I started doing my 25 widths and I did them all, I watched Racheal do 70 lengths but she was'nt sponsored so 4 people watching her gave Â£5.00.Altogether we raised Â£161.00 for a Somerset Hospice. Mum was busy counting the laps and adding up the sponsor money. We finished at 4.00 and took Mrs Francis back to Castle Cary.Then home. I made myself a sandwich as that is all I wanted. I watched T.V. At 7.00 Pat White picked Racheal and I up to go down there baby-sitting and we slept there. Mum and Dad, Pat and
